languages.text: "Просто признайся. Нет ничего плохого в том, что ты хочешь познать человеческую душу".
"Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."
languages.original_text: "Просто признайся. Нет ничего плохого в том, что ты хочешь познать человеческую душу".

traits.locale_text: "Just accept it. There's nothing bad about wanting to know a human's soul."
"Just accept it. There's nothing bad about wanting to know a human's soul."
"Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."
"Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."
"Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

languages.text: “你就承认了吧，想要了解人类的灵魂并不是什么坏事。”
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: “你就承认了吧，想要了解人类的灵魂并不是什么坏事。”

languages.text: «Admítelo y ya está. No tiene nada de malo que quieras conocer el alma de un ser humano».
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: «Admítelo y ya está. No tiene nada de malo que quieras conocer el alma de un ser humano».

languages.text: « Admettez-le. Il n'y a rien de criminel à vouloir découvrir une âme humaine. »
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: « Admettez-le. Il n'y a rien de criminel à vouloir découvrir une âme humaine. »

languages.text: "Gebt es ruhig zu. Es ist nicht falsch, die Seele eines Menschen kennen zu wollen."
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: "Gebt es ruhig zu. Es ist nicht falsch, die Seele eines Menschen kennen zu wollen."

languages.text: 「認めるんだ。人間の魂を知りたいと思うことは悪いことではない」
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: 「認めるんだ。人間の魂を知りたいと思うことは悪いことではない」

languages.text: "İtiraf et. Bir insanın ruhunu tanımak istemekte yanlış bir şey yok."
languages.original_text: "Just admit it. There is nothing wrong with wanting to know a human's soul."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf et. Bir insanın ruhunu tanımak istemekte yanlış bir şey yok."
